argument.name: markerGroup1
argument.description: The marker group to get the latitude/longitude. Can be specified as a string containing the name of a single marker group or an array of marker groups.

argument.name: markerGroupN
argument.description: Optional. Additional marker group to get the latitude/longitude. You can specify as many marker groups as you want, separated by commas.

page.description: Get the latitude/longitude of all the markers in one or more marker groups on the map.

discussion.p: The method will return a javascript object where the name of the marker group is used as the key for the marker group's latitude/longitude. For example, if you have a marker group named 'mymarkergroup1', the javascript would have a property named 'mymarkergroup1'. The value for 'mymarkergroup1' would be an array of latitude and longitude values.
